channel.title: many on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in many on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-07
item.description: Apple developing new ‘Apple Studio Display’ with 7K resolution (2 minute read) Apple is reportedly developing an Apple Studio Display with 7K resolution.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-14
item.description: Coinbase’s bouncing QR code Super Bowl ad was so popular it crashed the app (2 minute read) Coinbase’s Super Bowl ad was so popular its app temporarily crashed.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-06
item.description: Apple Reportedly in Talks With Toyota About Apple Car Production Starting 2024 (2 minute read) Apple is rumored to be visiting several car manufacturers in Asia to mass-produce a branded car by 2024.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-30
item.description: Facebook’s next hardware launch will be its Ray-Ban ‘smart glasses’ (2 minute read) Facebook’s next product release will be its Ray-Ban smart glasses.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-12
item.description: TikTok is reportedly testing a job recruitment tools (1 minute read) TikTok is testing a recruitment tool to help people find jobs and to help companies, recruiters, and brands find candidates.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-11
item.description: Leaked Renders Claim to Show Third-Generation AirPods Design (1 minute read) A set of renders claiming to showcase the design of the next generation of AirPods has been leaked from a supplier.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-22
item.description: Samsung imagines how its first AR glasses might look in these leaked concept videos (2 minute read) Samsung recently showed off a basic set of image-projecting goggles at CES 2020.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-19
item.description: Apple Hiring Engineers to Develop 6G Wireless (3 minute read) Apple recently posted job ads looking for wireless system research engineers for current and next-generation networks.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-11
item.description: The 5 biggest announcements from Apple’s ‘One More Thing’ hardware event (4 minute read) Apple announced new versions of the MacBook Air, the 13-inch MacBook Pro, and the Mac mini at its ‘One More Thing’ live stream.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-11
item.description: Inside TikTok’s killer algorithm (5 minute read) TikTok has revealed how its algorithm works.
